pages.text: The Eerie Pickaxe is a powerful tool that allows the user to reach 3 Blocks further. Breaking a block with this Pickaxe will cause the content to immediately transfer towards the user as well as any nearby experience orbs. However, there's a reason why the Pickaxe has been named Eerie...
The pickaxe can be repaired on an anvil with a $(l:intro/magical_components)Cursed Metal Ingot$().
